label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_016
content:
## 2026-01-18 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: REQUESTS req | p50: 500ms p95: 1160ms p99: 1160ms | err: 1.8% (28 errors) | success: 98.2%
- /ixfr-requests: REQUESTS req | p50: 500ms p95: 1160ms p99: 1160ms | err: 0.6% (1 error) | success: 99.4%
- /ttl-changes: REQUESTS req | p50: 1800ms p95: 1800ms p99: 1800ms | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /propagation: REQUESTS req | p50: 61ms p95: 145ms p99: 145ms | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /dns-queries: QPS avg: 22450 | QPS peak: 54800 | NX domain: 2.0% | Servfail: 0.04% | UDP: 97.2% | TCP fallback: 1.1%
- /dnssec-signing: zones signed: 72 | signing queue depth: 1 | signature refreshes: 115 | ds mismatch: 0 | bogus validation: 0
- /health-checks: authoritative reachability: 99.99% | SOA serial mismatch: 0 | lame delegations: 0
- /change-mgmt: change requests: 5 | changes applied: 5 | changes failed: 0 | mean apply time: 16 min
- /cache-behavior: resolver cache hit: 89.1% | negative cache hit: 38.0% | prefetch enabled: 78.0%
- /latency: auth response avg: 16.5ms | auth response p95: 39.4ms | EDNS0 present: 74.8%
- /errors: format errors: 5 | refused: 20 | rate limited: 8 | truncation TC: 0.3%
- /capacity: zones: 624 | records: 2,212,100 | dynamic updates/hr: 310
- /compliance: zonefile lint errors: 2 | dnssec policy violations: 0 | audit log gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 25% | Mem 60% | Disk 76% | Conns: 1208 | Net: 72/102 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 20% | Mem 48% | Disk 57% | Conns: 1012 | Net: 57/73 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 44% | Mem 65% | Disk 52% | Conns: N/A | Net: 92/130 Mbps | Queue depth: 2
- signer-01: CPU 29% | Mem 71% | Disk 62% | Conns: N/A | Net: 14/18 Mbps | HSM slot utilization: 62%

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active 0 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 0 | avg_wait: 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 89.1% | Bandwidth: 0.0 Gbps | Origin requests: 0

### Alerts
- [INFO] alert-name on hostname: value

### Deployments & Changes
- Implemented CAA record standard across 7 zones; verified no unintended impacts on issuance workflows and ensured consistent TTL 1800.
- Tuned negative caching SOA minimum in two zones to align with policy; reduced prolonged NXDOMAIN caching risk during migrations.
- Enabled additional resolver prefetch coverage (78%); observed small improvement in cache hit rate.
- Conducted spot checks for glue record correctness at registrar for newly migrated zones; no issues found.

### Events
- Implemented CAA record standard across 7 zones; verified no unintended impacts on issuance workflows and ensured consistent TTL 1800.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: G. Thompson. 0 pages. 4 tickets. Status: Normal; standards work completed with clean validation.
